interactivity.requirements: You must be on at least Day  355  to unlock this Event. You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " Food Groups "
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Upon fulfilling all Requirements, this Event automatically occurs on the first weekday on or after Day 355.

progression.synopsis: Otoha asks Sensei if the class need permission slips for the upcoming beach visit. Chika is wondering if it could be safe for Chinami to come. Rin tells Sensei that there may be a repeat of what happened last time , because she intends to confess to Otoha. Molly follows them out to ask if Rin is okay â€” Rin says not to worry about it.
trivia: Rin's conversation with Sensei is longer if he wasn't a bad homie .

changelog: This Event was added in Update .19p1.
